column4: ive got a problem with my Ubuntu computer. am I in the right place?
um.. can anyone see what im typing or am typing in the wrong place??
thank you for answering - im not brilliant with these things
my comuter crashed and refuses to boot atall (not the one im on)
ive purchased a Linux magazine today with a free CD on the cover and it till refuses to boot
i can normally get to "verifying DMI pool data"
then either it refuses to boot from CD or goes to grub
Ive tried all 6 options on Grum and none of them boot
ive tried that but will try again
held F12 and got a screen that says "phoenix - awardBIOS v6.00PG" at the bottom it sats Press F1 to continue
ok - so that's not an ubuntu issue then
I suggest trying the ##hardware channel or a hardware vendor on local yo you
I suggest trying the ##hardware channel or a hardware vendor on local yo you
yes, this isn't an ubuntu issue
or contact a computer repair shop local to you
